targets.query:
SB1=from(bucket: "EPIC")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "mqtt_consumer")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["customer"] == "NCING")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["group"] == "EPIC")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "flow")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => (r["topic"] == "tn/emr/TN2305084/tx"  ))
  |> drop(columns: ["_measurement", "tag"])
  |> drop(columns: ["_field", "tag"])
  |> drop(columns: ["_start", "tag"])
  |> drop(columns: ["_stop", "tag"])
  |> drop(columns: ["customer", "tag"])
  |> drop(columns: ["device", "tag"])
  |> drop(columns: ["group", "tag"])
  |> drop(columns: ["panel_board", "tag"])
  |> drop(columns: ["power_analyze", "tag"])
  |> drop(columns: ["topic", "tag"])
  |> drop(columns: ["utility_type", "tag"])
  |> drop(columns: ["_time", "tag"])
 |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _value: r._value /(3600.0) }))
  |>sum(column: "_value")

SB2=from(bucket: "EPIC")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "mqtt_consumer")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["customer"] == "NCING")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["group"] == "EPIC")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "flow")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => (r["topic"] == "tn/emr/TN2305083/tx"  ))
  |> drop(columns: ["_measurement", "tag"])
  |> drop(columns: ["_field", "tag"])
  |> drop(columns: ["_start", "tag"])
  |> drop(columns: ["_stop", "tag"])
  |> drop(columns: ["customer", "tag"])
  |> drop(columns: ["device", "tag"])
  |> drop(columns: ["group", "tag"])
  |> drop(columns: ["panel_board", "tag"])
  |> drop(columns: ["power_analyze", "tag"])
  |> drop(columns: ["topic", "tag"])
  |> drop(columns: ["utility_type", "tag"])
  |> drop(columns: ["_time", "tag"])
 |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _value: r._value /(3600.0) }))
   |>sum(column: "_value")

  union(tables: [SB1, SB2])
  |>sum(column: "_value")
     |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _value: r._value * 0.5/1000.0}))
|> rename(fn: (column) => {_newColumnName = if column =~ /^_/ then "" else column return _newColumnName})

gg1=from(bucket: "IMPRESS")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "mqtt_consumer")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => (r["topic"] == "tn/emr/TN2305105/tx"))
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "NCING/IMPRESS/INCTL/elec/main/gen1/E")
  |> group(columns: ["customer"])
  |> drop(columns: ["_measurement", "tag"])
  |> drop(columns: ["_field", "tag"])
  |> drop(columns: ["_start", "tag"])
  |> drop(columns: ["_stop", "tag"])
  |> drop(columns: ["customer", "tag"])
  |> drop(columns: ["device", "tag"])
  |> drop(columns: ["group", "tag"])
  |> drop(columns: ["panel_board", "tag"])
  |> drop(columns: ["power_analyze", "tag"])
  |> drop(columns: ["topic", "tag"])
  |> drop(columns: ["utility_type", "tag"])
  |> difference(nonNegative: true)
  |> drop(columns: ["_start", "tag"])
  |> drop(columns: ["_stop", "tag"])
  |> sum(column: "_value")
     |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _value: r._value /1000.00 * 0.53/1000.0}))

gb1=from(bucket: "IMPRESS")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "mqtt_consumer")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => (r["topic"] == "tn/emr/TN23158/tx"))
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "NCING/IMPRESS/INCTL/elec/main/random/flow_rate")
  |> group(columns: ["customer"])
  |> drop(columns: ["_measurement", "tag"])
  |> drop(columns: ["_field", "tag"])
  |> drop(columns: ["_start", "tag"])
  |> drop(columns: ["_stop", "tag"])
  |> drop(columns: ["customer", "tag"])
  |> drop(columns: ["device", "tag"])
  |> drop(columns: ["group", "tag"])
  |> drop(columns: ["panel_board", "tag"])

  |> drop(columns: ["_stop", "tag"])
  |> sum(column: "_value")
     |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _value: r._value /1000.00 * 0.53/1000.0}))


       union(tables: [gg1, gg2, gg3, reb1, reb2, gb1])
  |> group(columns: [])  // Ungroup data to remove group keys
  |> sum(column: "_value")
